metadata.title: CVE-2020-9365 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Pure-FTPd 1.0.49. An out-of-bounds (OOB) readhas been detected in the pure_strcmp function in utils.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9365` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pure-ftpd - 1.0.49-4
pure-ftpd-common - 1.0.49-4
pure-ftpd-ldap - 1.0.49-4
pure-ftpd-mysql - 1.0.49-4
pure-ftpd-postgresql - 1.0.49-4
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pure-ftpd package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.49-4').
